original_text: Then the Israelite people offered the temple to God, so that he would bless it. The priests, the Levites and the other people who had returned from Babylon were all very happy.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 기타 사로잡혔던 자의 자손이 즐거이 하나님의 성전 봉헌식을 행하니

sentences.original_text: Then the Israelite people offered the temple to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이스라엘 백성이 하나님께 성전을 드렸다

sentences.original_text: so that he would bless it
The priests were all very happy
the Levites were all very happy
the other people who had returned from Babylon
